mapper.select: SELECT m.id,name,phone,email FROM business b inner JOIN member m ON b.id = m.id where b.bcode=null;
mapper.insert: insert into member(id, name, password, phone, email,address, addr1,addr2, image,ownercode) values(#{id},#{name},#{password},#{phone},#{email},#{address},#{addr1},#{addr2},#{image},#{ownercode})
